title: Victorian Spa Country Escape with Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description:
Swap the computer screen for the golf green at RACV Goldfields Resort, a scenic country retreat in tranquil Creswick, ideal for exploring the charming towns of Victoria's Central Highlands. Soak away stress in Hepburn’s mineral-rich waters, cosy up in a country pub with a locally brewed cider, explore the forested landscape on two wheels or take time out to tee off at the on-site 18-hole golf course, considered one of Victoria’s best golf courses. Whether you’re looking to reignite romance, spend quality time with friends or unleash some energy on a family-friendly adventure, this luxury resort - located only 90 minutes' drive from Melbourne - feels a million miles from home.

Your retreat is complete with daily breakfast, leisurely 12pm checkout and 25% discount on golf green fees. Plus, indulge in the very best of the region's seasonal produce with daily A$25 drinks and dining credit per room to enjoy at the brand new Three Founders restaurant.

**RACV member bonus:** Enjoy a welcome bottle of house wine and a complimentary round of golf when you advise RACV staff of your membership upon check-in.

title: World-Class Boutique Escape Amid Tasmania’s Nature with Complimentary Room Upgrade
description: Discover the real Tasmania with a two-night escape to the award-winning Thousand Lakes Lodge, nestled within untouched World Heritage-Listed surrounds famous for breathtaking landscapes, world-class angling and sightings of rare Tasmanian devils in the wild. Enjoy daily breakfast, a glass of sparkling wine on arrival paired with a gourmet cheese platter showcasing local produce, an Adventure Pack for two, for a self-guided walking adventure amid nature, and a complimentary upgrade to a gorgeous King Premium Room.

title: Victorian Spa Country Escape with Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description:
Swap the computer screen for the golf green at RACV Goldfields Resort, a scenic countryside retreat in tranquil Creswick, perfectly situated for exploring the charming towns of Victoria's Central Highlands.

Whether you’re looking to soak away stress in Hepburn’s mineral-rich waters, indulge in exquisite food and wine across the region, be inspired by the lush forested landscape, get into the thick of things at a community market or take time out to tee off at the onsite 18-hole golf course, this luxury resort - located only 90 minutes' drive from Melbourne - feels a million miles from home.

title: Intimate Tasmanian Colonial Farmhouse Stay Near Hobart
description: Welcome to Ratho Farm-a rustic-chic colonial farmhouse in Tassie’s central highlands boasting intimate, boutique accommodation and home to Australia’s oldest golf course. Enjoy a long weekend with daily continental breakfast, dinner for two at the Farm’s communal Homestead area, a cheese platter on arrival, a welcome bottle of local Tasmanian Pinot Noir and more.

title: Relaxing Victoria Goldfields Escape
description:
Swap city lights for the lush hills of Victoria’s Central Highlands at RACV Goldfields Resort, a scenic countryside retreat in tranquil Creswick, just 90 minutes out of Melbourne. Nestled between the charming city of Ballarat and the mineral springs, country pubs, wineries and breathtaking scenery of Daylesford and Hepburn Springs, RACV Goldfields Resort is your launchpad to this romantic region.

Unwind in the outdoor swimming pool and hot tub, sweat it out at the fitness centre, try your backhand on the tennis court and take a swing on the 6,200-metre golf course, one of Victoria’s best forest courses. A Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice 2020 winner, this peaceful resort invites you to explore the charms of regional Victoria in style.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Begin each day with breakfast at Three Founders restaurant
- Celebrate your escape with a welcome drink on arrival
- Enjoy a well-deserved sleep-in with guaranteed 12pm late checkout

**RACV member bonus inclusions:**

- Cheers with a welcome bottle of wine in your room on arrival
- Cosy up with one complimentary in-room movie per stay
- Enjoy exclusive member pricing on select local experiences through RACV ticketing

**Looking for added romance?** Upgrade to an ultra-spacious Premium Fairway Suite, boasting 76sqm of indoor-outdoor living, a luxurious two-person spa bath and serene bush views. Spend evenings curled up by the gas fire or watch the sunset over Creswick State Forest.
